ygData.subject: Re: Aw: [neat] Accelerating Deep Neuroevolution: Train Atari in Hours on a Single Personal Computer
ygData.msgSnippet: TL;DR: In our specific case we needed 2-3 consumer grade GPUs and about 30 CPUs. A single V100 or other datacenter GPUs would probably have no trouble
